name: Arvind Rajaraman
description: I'm a sophomore EECS + Business major interested in deep learning, natural language processing, quantitative finance, and venture capital, as well as how to apply AI to the business world. I'm an Education Officer at ML@B and Researcher at BAIR. Outside of school, I like cooking, traveling, hiking, and watching TV shows! If you want to talk about ML, business, or literally anything, email me and let's chat!

name: Anca Dragan
description: Professor Dragan is an Associate Professor at UC Berkeley's EECS Department. She runs the InterACT Lab, which focuses on algorithms for human-robot interaction in domains like autonomous vehicles, optimal control, and reinforcement learning, is part of BAIR's steering committee, and co-PI of the Center for Human-Compatible AI. Professor Dragan has 6,000+ citations and an h-index of 41.

name: Max Smolin
description: I’m a sophomore Computer Science student interested in great engineering, fixing the obvious, and building teams that work. As a programmer I am excited about Machine Learning in Computer Vision, as well as type theory, theoretical CS, and programming languages. In my spare time, I enjoy cooking, going on hikes, working out, and competitive video gaming.

name: Arjun Sripathy
description: I’m a third year EECS major broadly interested in how ML can improve various aspects of our everyday lives. I’m always excited to share my passion with others and get people thinking what’s possible with intelligent algorithms today! Academically, I enjoy research and teaching. Outside of that I love to spend time outdoors, play/watch sports, and talk with others about anything!
